name: Farm to Table: Wizard Edition
description:
Content Warning: Alcohol use and mild language

Resolution: If you have issues with the game not displaying correctly, try playing in full screen, or zooming in/out in your browser.

---

Haven't made anything in a while, so was happy to join Ludum Dare 52.

The theme was "Harvest" and community feedback seemed to jump to folks doing either:

1) Farming

2) Harvesting Souls

3) Going out of their way not to do 1 or 2

We initially ended up in group 3, but came up with an idea that we enjoyed that firmly planted us in group 1 (dad pun not intended, I swear).

---

You play as Hungoveldore, a wizard recently released from Grogwarts. You decide to use your magical abilities to open a tavern: after all, you can make crops grow or beer brew in seconds with your spells.

But Hungoveldore is about to learn that making and serving beer is a lot tougher than drinking it. Try to serve as many customers as you can to maximize your profit before the stress takes hold.

---

Move: WASD

Select Crop or Seed: Left Mouse Button

Interact: Right Mouse Button

Drink Beer: E

Pause Game: Tab
